description: Informal submission using 'Resource Recommendation' pattern with markdown headers (no labels). Uses '### Category' not 'Category:' so fewer template signals - triggers MEDIUM confidence (warn).
title: Resource Recommendation: awesome-resource
body:
## Resource Recommendation

### Resource Name
awesome-resource

### Resource URL
https://github.com/username/awesome-resource

### Category
Slash-Commands > Project & Task Management

### About
A plugin that generates documents from conversation context. Works standalone without external templates.

### Features
- Works immediately after install
- Synthesizes requirements from conversation
- Generates standard sections
- Accepts optional arguments

### Author
Username (@username)
